title: My Pixel 2 is stuck in the Bootloader. There is a yellow-highlighted error at the bottom: "Slot Unbo
content:
Someone else had the same issue as below too. The exact same problem happened to me.
=======
My Pixel 2 is stuck in the Bootloader. There is a yellow-highlighted error at the bottom: "Slot Unbootable: Load Error". When I use the volume keys to scroll to "Recovery Mode" and select with the Power Button, it simply returns to the error screen. After searching this forum, it appears I need to call Google Support, but I have to post my problem first. This is the obligatory post so that I may have Google call me.
